heading: Harbor of Wealth
description: Liyue which means Lapis Moon / Glazed Moon in Chinease is one of the seven areas within Teyvat and is heavily inspired by China. This area of Teyvat was created 3,700 years ago and worships the Geo Archon Morax. You’ll first visit this place during the “Of the Land Amidst Monoliths” Archon Quest.
